column2: By sponsoring immigration to this province, we can begin to slowly shift the culture and religion of this province.

These are dark dire times, the hordes of the heathen are upon us.  Are armies have recently been dealt a devestating setback in the field.  Perhaps it is time to mobilize the vast native Aramaic and Arabic rural population to fight for our Holy cause?

The glorious city of Constantinople was horribly devestated during the events of the siege and subsequent sack of Constantinople.  Now that we have recovered the city and have the means to accompilish it, perhaps it is time to restore the city once more
Since the creation of the Latin Empire, the duchy of Antioch has proclaimed itself to be our vassal, now that we have stabilized our situation it is time to make that claim a reality.
As the Latin Empire we have the true dominion over the Levant and the Crusader States in the region must submit to our rule
As the Latin Empire we have the true dominion over the Levant and the Crusader States in the region must submit to our rule
Organize the Order of St. Sampson
Organize the Order of St. Sampson
After a series of disasters, catastrophes, mass chaos and the sack of Constantinople in 1204, we hve finally reunited the core empire and can restore the Byzantine Empire
